ShanjoyTours.overview: Accommodation & Meals   Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost   Day Accommodation Meals   1       The Ark     Mid-range lodge inside Aberdare NP (Kenya)     Lunch & Dinner Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              Lunch & Dinner Included       2       Lake Nakuru Lodge     Mid-range lodge inside Lake Nakuru NP (Kenya)     All Meals Included                   +10 Photos          +9 Photos              All Meals Included       3-5       PrideInn Mara Camp     Mid-range tented camp bordering Masai Mara NR (Kenya) without fences     All Meals Included                   +6 Photos          +5 Photos              All Meals Included       6-7       Osinon Camp     Mid-range tented camp inside Central Serengeti NP (Tanzania)     All Meals Included                   +12 Photos          +11 Photos              All Meals Included       8       Marera Valley Lodge     Mid-range lodge 1-2hr drive from Ngorongoro Crater (Tanzania)     All Meals Included                   +7 Photos          +6 Photos              All Meals Included       9       Sentrim Amboseli Lodge     Mid-range tented camp just outside Amboseli NP (Kenya)     All Meals Included                   +8 Photos          +7 Photos              All Meals Included       10      End of tour(No accommodation)      Breakfast & Lunch Included           Breakfast & Lunch Included
ShanjoyTours.rates: Start dates   Solo 1 room   2+ people Sharing rooms       Jul 1, 2024 - Oct 31, 2024    n/a*   $4,730     Nov 1, 2024 - Dec 20, 2024    n/a*   $4,312     Dec 21, 2024 - Jan 2, 2025    n/a*   $4,730     Jan 3, 2025 - Mar 31, 2025    n/a*   $4,389     Apr 1, 2025 - Jun 30, 2025    n/a*   $4,378
ShanjoyTours.inclusions: Excluded  International flights (From/to home) Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour Tips (Tipping guideline US$10.00 pp per day) Personal items (Souvenirs, travel insurance, visa fees, etc.) Government imposed increase of taxes and/or park fees Drinks
ShanjoyTours.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
